title: I Can’t Wait For Nijigaku’s Live! Part 4
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>I wonder if I forgot anything....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Haven’t you checked your luggage 3 times already? It’s fine, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s right, Ayumu-san. You always prepare things well in advance, don’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>But, Karin-san, Shioriko-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, it’s okay, everything will be fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh? Something fell out.... Is this yours, Karin-san....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh no! It fell out!? I thought I properly put it in....  Fufu, that’s my bad.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>....Karin-san. Why don’t we check your luggage one more time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? I-, it’s alright, you know? As a model, I have plenty of experience traveling around for a photo shoot, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Karin-san, is this also one of your belongings?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah..... Umm.... Maaaybee....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Shioriko-san, help me check her stuff!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Got it! I’ll be extra careful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>T-, thank god my juniors are so reliable~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
